keyMoments.title: Sabo Recaptured by His Father
keyMoments.description: After learning about the planned fire, Sabo rushes to warn Ace and Luffy but is intercepted and captured by his father Outlook III and his men.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the oppression Sabo faces from his noble family, preventing him from saving his brothers.
keyMoments.quote: Let me go! I have to warn Ace and Luffy!

keyMoments.title: Sabo Imprisoned in Wine Cellar
keyMoments.description: Sabo's father locks him in a wine cellar to prevent him from interfering with the nobility's plans.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the extent of his father's control and the family's complicity in the Gray Terminal massacre.

keyMoments.title: Sabo Escapes to Save Gray Terminal Residents
keyMoments.description: Sabo breaks out of the wine cellar and races toward Gray Terminal's gates, desperately trying to warn and save the residents.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sabo's compassion and moral courage, defining his character and future revolutionary path.

keyMoments.title: Sabo Meets Dragon at the Gate
keyMoments.description: At the locked gates of Gray Terminal, Sabo encounters Dragon and expresses his shame at being born noble. Dragon reveals he too was born in the Goa Kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: First meeting between Dragon and Sabo, establishing connection that leads to Sabo joining the Revolutionary Army.
keyMoments.quote: This kingdom smells worse than Gray Terminal. I'm ashamed that I was born a noble.

relationships.description: Sabo meets Dragon during the Gray Terminal fire and shares his disgust with the nobility. Dragon sympathizes with him, planting seeds for their future relationship.

evolutionMoments.description: First meeting at Gray Terminal gates where Dragon consoles Sabo and reveals he too was born in Goa Kingdom.

relationships.description: Sabo's oppressive father who imprisons him to prevent interference with the nobility's plans.

evolutionMoments.description: Outlook III captures and imprisons Sabo in a wine cellar to stop him from warning Gray Terminal residents.

reveals.information: Sabo is willing to risk everything to save people society deems 'trash', showing nobility of character over nobility of birth
Sabo is deeply ashamed of his noble heritage and the cruelty of the upper class

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Confronts Ace and Luffy
keyMoments.description: Bluejam, betrayed by the nobles and desperate to escape the fire, demands Ace and Luffy reveal their treasure's location. Ace refuses.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the moment where Ace will demonstrate his Conqueror's Haki.

keyMoments.title: Ace Unleashes Conqueror's Haki for the First Time
keyMoments.description: When Bluejam's crew threatens Luffy, 10-year-old Ace unconsciously releases Conqueror's Haki, knocking out all of Bluejam's crew except Bluejam himself.
keyMoments.significance: First time Ace displays Conqueror's Haki, confirming his inherited potential from Gol D. Roger and marking him as someone with kingly qualities.

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Captures Ace at Gunpoint
keyMoments.description: Despite his Haki knocking out the crew, Bluejam resists and captures Ace, holding a gun to his head.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Conqueror's Haki alone isn't enough against determined enemies with strong will.

abilities.description: Ace unconsciously releases Supreme King Haki when Luffy is threatened, knocking out enemies with weak wills.

reveals.information: Ace possesses Conqueror's Haki, a rare ability inherited from his father Gol D. Roger
Ace will protect Luffy at all costs, even when facing overwhelming danger

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Threatens Luffy and Ace
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Ace are confronted by the desperate and betrayed Bluejam Pirates in the burning Gray Terminal.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy's danger triggers Ace's first use of Conqueror's Haki.

name.japanese: モンキー・D・ドラゴン

keyMoments.title: Dragon Meets Sabo at Gray Terminal Gate
keyMoments.description: Dragon encounters a beaten Sabo at the Gray Terminal gates. Sabo expresses his shame at being born noble and his disgust with the kingdom. Dragon reveals he too was born in the Goa Kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the connection between Dragon and Sabo that will lead to Sabo joining the Revolutionary Army. Provides insight into Dragon's motivation for becoming a revolutionary.
keyMoments.quote: I understand. I too was born in this kingdom.

relationships.description: Dragon meets Sabo during the Gray Terminal fire and sympathizes with his plight, establishing the foundation for their future relationship.

evolutionMoments.description: First meeting where Dragon consoles Sabo and reveals shared origins in Goa Kingdom.

reveals.information: Dragon was born in the Goa Kingdom, providing insight into his revolutionary motivations

keyMoments.title: Nobles Order Bluejam to Burn Gray Terminal
keyMoments.description: Bluejam and his crew are tasked by the Goa nobility with burning down Gray Terminal, with false promises of nobility as reward.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Bluejam's role as the executioner of the nobility's cruel plan and his eventual betrayal.

keyMoments.title: Gray Terminal Fire Begins
keyMoments.description: Bluejam's men shoot flaming arrows at barrels throughout Gray Terminal, engulfing the entire slum in fire.
keyMoments.significance: Bluejam carries out mass murder on behalf of the nobles.

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Betrayed by the Nobility
keyMoments.description: After burning Gray Terminal, Bluejam discovers the gates remain locked and he's been betrayed by the nobles who promised him status.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the nobility's willingness to sacrifice even their own tools, driving Bluejam's desperation.

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Confronts Ace and Luffy
keyMoments.description: Enraged and desperate, Bluejam demands Ace and Luffy reveal their treasure's location, threatening violence.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the climactic battle and Ace's Haki reveal.
keyMoments.quote: Tell me where you hid the treasure, or I'll kill you both right here!

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Resists Ace's Haki and Captures Him
keyMoments.description: Unlike his crew, Bluejam resists Ace's Conqueror's Haki and retaliates by grabbing Ace at gunpoint.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Bluejam's strong will and creates dramatic tension for the next episode.

reveals.information: Bluejam has strong enough willpower to resist Conqueror's Haki, unlike his crew

keyMoments.title: Outlook III Recaptures and Imprisons Sabo
keyMoments.description: Outlook III orders his men to capture Sabo and personally oversees his imprisonment in a wine cellar to prevent him from interfering with the Gray Terminal fire.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Outlook III's complicity in the nobility's plan and his oppressive control over his son.

relationships.description: Outlook III is Sabo's oppressive father who imprisons him to maintain noble appearances and prevent interference with the Gray Terminal massacre.

evolutionMoments.description: Outlook III captures and imprisons Sabo in a wine cellar.

keyMoments.title: Dadan Witnesses Gray Terminal Fire
keyMoments.description: Dadan and her family see the massive fire engulfing Gray Terminal from a distance, realizing the danger Ace and Luffy are in.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Dadan's rescue attempt in the following episode.

keyMoments.title: Ahho Zurako First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Appears as a minor noble character during the Gray Terminal fire arc.
keyMoments.significance: Minor character debut in the Goa Kingdom nobility.

keyMoments.title: Ahho Desunen IX First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Appears as a minor noble character during the Gray Terminal fire arc.
keyMoments.significance: Minor character debut in the Goa Kingdom nobility.
